backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, posts, comments, stories, notifications, conversations, feature flags, and follow graph types plus storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptive summaries for many frontend files to assist with build planning and understanding project structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, TanStack Router routes, auth/role guards, and a user‑friendly error fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/FeatureFla: Admin panel UI for viewing and toggling feature flags with backend updates and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PostModera: Displays all posts for admins with loading/error states and allows deleting posts; each post item shows author and image preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/SupportIss: Shows support issues with creator info and lets admins update issue statuses; includes category labels and status icons.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserModera: Allows searching users and performing moderation actions like verification changes, blocking, and role adjustments with error handling.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component rendering header, content outlet, mobile tab bar, and footer with version info.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Provides a login UI using Internet Identity with a simple sign‑in button and branding.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content, handling authentication, profile loading, timeouts, and showing setup or error screens when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Restricts access based on caller role, showing loading, error, or access‑denied states before rendering children.
Renders a horizontal list of active stories with avatars and a viewer, including a create‑story control and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/IdeaList.tsx: Placeholder component showing a stubbed ideas list message.
frontend/src/components/IdeaSubmissionFo: Placeholder component displaying a stubbed idea submission form.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeade: Simple header component showing a title, optional description, and optional action elements.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing links, notifications, settings, and the user avatar with role‑based admin access.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTabBar: Mobile bottom tab bar with navigation icons and profile routing, including optional moderation tab for officers.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a full post card with author info, image loading states, like/share UI, and optional delete handling.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostGrid.t: Renders a responsive grid of posts with image loading states and navigation to individual post pages.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal dialog allowing users to edit profile fields, handle validation, and submit updates with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Follow/unfollow button managing follow state, pending requests, and mutation feedback.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowRe: Panel listing incoming follow requests with approve/deny actions and requester profile info.
frontend/src/components/profile/Highligh: Static highlights row UI with a 'new' button and placeholder highlight circles.
frontend/src/components/profile/MediaCon: Admin panel for viewing and toggling global media-related feature flags like filters and music.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar with size options and a fallback image.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Form dialog for creating a new user profile with basic fields and error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/SuperAdm: Super-admin panel to manage a user's verification status, preventing changes to admin accounts.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verified: SVG component rendering a colored verified badge icon with selectable variants.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Dialog for uploading and previewing an image to create a new story with validation.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryVie: Viewer dialog to display a story image, show author info, and like or unlike the story.
frontend/src/constants/superAdmin.ts: Defines the super-admin principal and helpers for checking super-admin identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and returns a backend actor based on authentication state and manages query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitTimeout.t: Tracks if actor fetching exceeds 15 seconds and returns a timeout flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminModeration.ts: Provides a mutation for setting user verification state, but backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppIdeas.ts: Placeholder hooks for app ideas and submissions, currently returning static data or errors.
Displays formatted backend errors or success messages using toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s effective role based on identity, super-admin check, and backend role lookup.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeatureFlags.ts: Fetches and updates feature flags via actor calls, invalidating cache on update.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowRequests.ts: Stub hooks for follow request operations; backend methods are missing so they return empty data or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Stub messaging hooks for conversations and messages; backend methods are unavailable so they throw errors or return empty lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Stub hooks for notifications; returns empty data and errors since backend methods are missing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostImageSrc.ts: Builds a safe image src from an ExternalBlob, validating direct URLs or falling back to Blob creation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Various post-related hooks that rely on unimplemented backend methods, providing errors or empty results.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, with most mutation methods stubbed due to missing backend endpoints.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialGraph.ts: Hooks for followers/following and follow actions, all currently throwing errors because backend methods are not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Story-related query and mutation hooks, largely stubbed out with errors for missing backend story methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Support issue submission and retrieval hooks that currently error due to missing backend support endpoints.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference with localStorage syncing and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserModerationActi: User moderation hooks for blocking, unblocking, and role changes, calling actual actor methods and invalidating queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with light/dark color palettes, admin accent colors, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortalPage.tsx: Admin portal page with tabbed panels for user, post, feature, and support moderation.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Initializes or loads a conversation with a peer, displays messages, and allows sending new ones with auto‑scroll and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a post with caption and optional image upload, including validation, preview, and submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Lets users search for profiles and displays recent posts, showing search results and a grid of latest content.
frontend/src/pages/FollowersFollowingPag: Displays either followers or following for a user, fetching profile and social graph data and allowing navigation to other profiles.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeedPage.tsx: Shows the user's home feed with stories, posts, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Lists user conversations with peers, showing recent messages and unread counts, and links to individual conversation threads.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays notifications and follow requests, handles loading/errors, and marks notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post with author info, image, comments, and supports adding new comments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders a user profile with posts, followers, role-based UI, and follow/edit actions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for appearance, account actions like logout, support access, and app info.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Lets users submit support issues with category and description, handling validation and submission.
frontend/src/types/missing-backend-types: Defines TypeScript types for posts, comments, stories, notifications, support issues, and messaging based on backend structures.
frontend/src/utils/formatBackendError.ts: Maps various backend and IC agent error messages to user-friendly strings, falling back to the raw message or a generic error.
frontend/src/utils/postImage.ts: Provides helpers to convert image byte data to blob URLs, revoke them, and convert File objects to Uint8Array for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/verifiedBadge.ts: Determines which verified badge color to show based on user profile role and verification state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, current goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the Instabook app.
